overview: The year of 2884 A.D., December, a battle broke out between the Mercenary troops and Shutral Forces in the Australian desert. Surrounded by strong electromagnetic active waves, without any hope of reinforcement, the battle was getting furious and also, it was getting dark.
tagline: The year of 2884 A.D. there broke out an outrage furious battle in the Australian Mid Western...
title: S.F.3.D Original Video: Nutrocker
